1. Information We May Collect from You

1.1 We may collect and process the following information about you:
1.1.1 Information that you provide by filling in forms on our website www.littles.co.uk. This includes information provided when booking chauffeur services, subscribing to updates, or reporting issues with our website.
1.1.2 Details provided when contacting us by phone, email, or other communication methods.
1.1.3 Details of your visits to our website, including traffic data, location data, weblogs, and other communication data required for our own purposes or resources you access.
1.2 The information you provide may include your name, email address, phone number, and payment details.

2. IP Addresses
We may collect information about your computer, including your IP address, operating system, browser type, and other technical details for system administration. This is statistical data about our users’ browsing actions and patterns and does not identify individuals.
3. Cookies

Our website uses cookies to enhance user experience. You can find detailed information about our cookie use in our Cookie Policy available on our website.

4. Where We Store Your Personal Data

4.1 Personal data may be stored and processed outside the UK or EEA. We take reasonable steps to ensure your data is secure and compliant with applicable laws.
4.2 While we use secure servers, data transmission via the internet may not always be completely secure. By submitting your data, you acknowledge these risks.

5. Uses of the Information

We use your information to:

  • Provide our services and fulfill bookings.
  • Improve our website and service delivery.
  • Respond to queries and communicate updates.
  • Comply with legal obligations.

 

6. Disclosure of Your Information

We may share your data with trusted third parties, including payment processors, analytics providers, and subcontractors, solely for business purposes.

 

7. Your Rights

You have the right to request access to your data, object to its processing, or request corrections. Please contact us at reservations@littles.co.uk for inquiries regarding your data.

8. Changes to our Privacy Policy

We reserve the right to update this policy. Changes will be posted on our website, and where appropriate, you may be notified by email.
